page.title: 03Somerby Grove Farm.
page.content: Somerby Grove Farm is a typical farm in our area. It is a mixed farm with animals and crops that cover 540 acres.Mr Laming lives on the farm with his wife and three children,two boys and a girl.He owns most of the land but rents some from the Bacon family who live in Norfolk.The farm employs 5 people including Mr.Laming ,three full-time and two part-time.He keeps 64 dairy cows,1 limousin bull called Uno,100 calves,40 beef cows,1 dog and 12 kittens. Mr. Laming grows wheat, barley, oats, oil seed rape and sugar beet. The rest of the land is used for growing grass.This is cut twice a year and used for silage to feed the cows in winter. {See next page.
